scripts.nuke: docker stop tnt-docker && docker rm tnt-docker && docker volume rm tnt && rm -rf prisma/migrations
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name tnt-docker -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -e POSTGRES_DATABSE=tnt -d -p 5432:5432 -v tnt:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.migrateDB: prisma migrate save --name 'init' --experimental && prisma migrate up --experimental
